bibl.title: The Comedy of Menander. Convention, Variation and Originality.
bibl.note: I. Convention and Variation. - II. Artistic Principles: Polyphony; Economy; Emphasis on human interaction. - III. The Chorus and Related Problems. - IV. Technical Variety in the Use of Motifs. - V. Between Comedy and Life: Dyskolos; Samia. - VI. Divine Interventions and Human Agents.
ZAGAGI Netta, The Comedy of Menander. Convention, Variation and Originality.
Bloomington - Indianapolis, Indiana University Press, 1995, 8Â°, 210 pp. ISBN 0-253-36851-0.
